alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 14 at 4:30AM AKST until November 16 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk Valley, Middle Yukon Valley and Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance for a wintry mix south of Kaltag. Ice accumulations of a light glaze is possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley
